Author: Автор
Name: Назва
ADVENTURE.ImportOverwriteWarning: Деякі матеріали з пригоди {name} вже існують у вашому світі. Якщо ви імпортуєте пригоду, вони будуть перезаписані. Бажаєте продовжити?
ADVENTURE.Name: Назва Пригоди
ADVENTURE.NameHint: Оберіть назву для цієї пригоди, яка буде унікальною у наборі, який містить її.
ADVENTURE.ImageHint: Надайте зображення банера з шириною принаймні 768px та висотою 300px, яке буде відображатися для цієї пригоди.
ADVENTURE.Caption: Заголовок Банеру
ADVENTURE.CaptionHint: Текст, який буде показаний під банером. Цей заголовок може містити в собі HTML або звичайний текст.
ADVENTURE.DescriptionHint: Опис містить огляд і синопсис пригоди.
ADVENTURE.ExportDropZone: Перетягніть елементи з вашого Світу для того, щоб заповнити контент Пригоди.
APP.NavigateBackConfirm: Ви впевнені, що хочете вийти з гри Foundry Virtual Tabletop?
CARDS.DealHint: Choose a set of hands or piles to which cards will be dealt. The same number of cards are dealt to all selected hands/piles.
CARDS.DealWarnNoTargets: You must create a hand or pile to deal cards to.
CARDS.DeleteCannotHint: The following decks still have cards drawn and cannot be deleted, please reset them first: {decks}
CARDS.DeleteMustReset: This {type} must be reset before it can be deleted, would you like to proceed?
CARDS.DrawHint: Choose a deck from which to draw a certain number of cards.
CARDS.DrawWarnNoSources: Немає доступних колод, з яких можна грати.
CARDS.PassHint: Pass some number of cards to another hand or pile.
CARDS.PassWarnNoTargets: There are no hands or piles available which you can pass to.
CARDS.ResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset {name}? All dealt cards will be recalled.
CARDS.ReturnConfirm: Are you sure? All cards in {name} will be returned to their original decks.
CARD.FaceDeleteWarning: Видалення обличчя цієї карти назавжди видалить його дані з Карти.
CARD.Name: Назва
CARD.PlayHint: Play this card by passing it to some other hand or pile.
CHAT.FlushWarning: Усі повідомлення у чаті буде остаточно видалено.
CHAT.InvalidCommand: {command} не є дійсною командою повідомлень в чаті.
CHAT.Title: Історія Чату
COMBAT.EndConfirmation: Завершити це бойове зіткнення та очистити трекер ходів?
COMBAT.Linked: Пов'язано зі сценою, натисніть, щоб відв'язати
COMBAT.NoneActive: Зараз немає активного Бойового Зіткнення в цій сцені.
COMBAT.NoneRemaining: У цьому Зіткненні не залишилося Учасників Бою, що не зазнали поразки.
COMBAT.ResourceHint: Виберіть атрибут, який будете відстежуватися для кожного учасника бою.
COMBAT.SkipDefeatedHint: Автоматично пропускати учасників бою, позначених як переможні?
COMBAT.Unlinked: Неприв'язаний бій, натисніть щоб прив'язати до сцени
COMBAT.CombatantNotInScene: Учасник Бою {name} відсутній у вашій поточній сцені
COMPENDIUM.Name: Назва Компендіуму
COMPENDIUM.CreateHint: Створіть новий Компендіум у вашому поточному Світі.
COMPENDIUM.DeleteWarning: Цей Компендіум буде остаточно видалений і його не можна буде відновити.
COMPENDIUM.DeleteEntryWarning: Цей елемент Компендіуму і його дані будуть остаточно видалені.
COMPENDIUM.DuplicateHint: Ви можете копіювати цей компендію в ваш Світ, щоб мати локальну копію вмісту, який можна відредагувати.
COMPENDIUM.ErrorRequireTitle: Для створення Компендіуму Світу потрібно задати назву.
COMPENDIUM.ImportAllHint: Імпортувати весь контент з цього Компендіума в нову або існуючу папку. Зверніть увагу, що імпорт великих Компендіумів негативно вплине на продуктивність програми.
COMPENDIUM.ImportAllStart: Імпорт елементів {number} {type} до папки {folder}. Будь ласка, будьте терплячими.
COMPENDIUM.TypeHint: Кожен Компендіум містить певний тип Документів.
COMPENDIUM.ToggleLockedWarning: Ви намагаєтеся розблокувати для редагування компендіум, що не належить до цього Світу. Будь-які зміни, внесені вами в цьому компендіумі, можуть бути втрачені при оновленні системи або модуля. Ви можете створити копію компендіуму у ваш світ натомість. Бажаєте продовжити?
CONTROLS.Title: Контроль Грою
CONTROLS.Instructions: Ця форма описує загальні команди клавіатури та миші, які використовуються для керування різними аспектами середовища Foundry Virtual Tabletop. Деякі елементи керування доступні лише для користувача Game Master і виділяються на яскравому фіолетовому фоні.
CONTROLS.MeasureConfigHint: Налаштуйте розміщення та відображення шаблону для вимірювання.
CONTROLS.FOWResetDesc: Це скине туман війни для цієї сцени для всіх гравців.
CONTROLS.ClearAllHint: Остаточно видалити всі {type} об'єкти з цієї сцени?
CONTROLS.HeaderGameNotes: Ці елементи контролю, як правило, застосовуються для всіх аспектів функціоналу Foundry.
CONTROLS.HeaderCanvasNotes: Ці елементи застосовуються під час взаємодії із полотном.
CONTROLS.HeaderObjectsNotes: Ці елементи керування застосовуються при взаємодії з об'єктом, розміщеним на Полотні.
CONTROLS.HeaderSpecialNotes: Ці елементи керування застосовуються лише під час спеціалізованих взаємодій.
DICE.ErrorNonNumeric: Формула кидання кренелів {formula} не дала числового результату.
DICE.WarnMissingData: Атрибут {match} не був присутній в наданих даних кидка.
DOCUMENT.ImportDataHint1: Ви можете імпортувати дані для цього {document} з експортованого файлу JSON.
DOCUMENT.ImportDataHint2: Ця операція оновить дані для {name} і не може бути скасована.
DOCUMENT.Imported: Дані для {document} "{name}" успішно імпортовані з JSON.
DOCUMENT.SheetPermissionWarn: У вас немає прав для перегляду {document}.
DOCUMENT.UsePermissionWarn: У вас немає прав для використання {document}.
DRAWING.NoteFill: Регулювати параметри заповнення для цього Малюнка.
DRAWING.NoteText: Налаштуйте текстову мітку, застосовану до цього Малюнка (якщо такі є).
DRAWING.Author: Автор
DRAWING.SmoothingFactorHint: For freehand drawing, the smoothing factor controls the amount of spline smoothing.
EFFECT.Label: Ярлик Ефекта
ERROR.BrowserVersion: Foundry Virtual Tabletop використовує сучасні функції JavaScript, які не підтримуються з версією {browser} меншою за {minimum}. Ви використовуєте {browser} версію {version}. Будь ласка, оновіться або використовуйте інший браузер.
ERROR.ElectronVersion: Ви використовуєте стару версію Foundry Virtual Tabletop Electron клієнта. Для оптимальної роботи рекомендуємо повторно завантажити потрібну версію Foundry Virtual Tabletop і виконати повне перевстановлення програмного забезпечення.
ERROR.LowResolution: Для Foundry Virtual Tabletop необхідний мінімальний розмір екрану {reqWidth}px на {reqHeight}px або вище. На вашому екрані ефективна роздільна здатність {width}пікселів на {height}px, у результаті багато функцій програмного забезпечення можуть працювати некоректно.
ERROR.NoWebGL: Ваш браузер не підтримує рендеринг WebGL, необхідний Foundry Virtual Tabletop. Переконайтеся, що у драйвері вашого пристрою та WebGL увімкнені у браузері.
ERROR.NoWebGL2: Ваш браузер не підтримує рендерінг WebGL Version 2, який рекомендовано в Foundry Virtual Tabletop.
ERROR.BackgroundTextureSize: Ви використовуєте текстуру тла Сцени з розмірами {width}px на {height}px. Один або обидва ці виміри перевищують максимальний розмір текстур на {max}px, підтримуваних вашим пристроєм.
ERROR.InvalidAdminKey: Невірний пароль адміністратора сервера. Якщо ви забули налаштований пароль, вам потрібно буде вручну видалити файл Config/admin.txt в папці даних користувача.
ERROR.TokenCollide: Токен під час руху стикається хоча б з однією стіною.
ERROR.LoadPackages: The request to browse existing packages failed to connect with the Foundry server. Make sure your application allows outbound connections.
ERROR.NoTargetUsersForWhisper: No target users exist for this whisper. Check your spelling or try "/w [User Name]" instead.
ERROR.CantWhisper: You do not have permission to send whispered chat messages to other users.
ERROR.RendererNotDetected: Your GPU renderer was unable to be identified, unexpected performance issues may occur.
ERROR.NoHardwareAcceleration: Your web browser does not have hardware acceleration enabled. This will severely impair the performance of Foundry Virtual Tabletop. Be sure to enable hardware acceleration in your browser settings.
WARNING.GridConfigNoBG: You are using the grid configuration tool for a scene with no background image. This is not currently recommended and may produce unpredictable results.
WARNING.ForegroundDimensionsMismatch: The dimensions of your configured Foreground Layer image do not match the dimensions of the Background Layer image for this scene. The foreground has been resized which may have undesired results.
EDITOR.Heading: Заголовок {level}
EDITOR.EditingHTMLWarning: Another user has edited the same document. Any changes you have made to the HTML would erase their changes and so cannot be saved.
EDITOR.Resync: Your editor state has desynchronized from the server and must be reset. Your original editor contents have been copied to your clipboard.
EDITOR.NoUploadPermission: You must have file upload permissions to insert image content.
EDITOR.ImageDimensionsHint: Leaving these blank will use the image's intrinsic size.
EDITOR.ProseMirrorBadArguments: Both a document and a name must be supplied to create a ProseMirror instance.
FILES.TileSizeHint: Specify the pixel grid size of source tile artwork so it will be automatically resized when placed onto your active Scene.
FILES.NoResults: No matching results found in this location.
FILES.ErrorTooLarge: The file you have attempted to upload is too large for your proxy server to handle.
FILES.ErrorSomethingWrong: Something went wrong with your file upload request.
FILES.WarnUploadModules: You have uploaded files into a module or system directory. This is generally unsafe because updates to the system or module will delete your files.
FONTS.TypeHint: 'File' type fonts are loaded from your data folder and downloaded by your players. 'System' type fonts are loaded from your OS and each of your players must also have that font available in their OS.
FONTS.FontPreview: Sphinx of black quartz, judge my vow.
GAME.PausedWarning: You cannot take this action while the game is currently paused.
INFO.SceneViewCanvasDisabled: Сцена "{name}" вже переглянута, але не відображається, тому що ігрове полотно вимкнено.
INVITATIONS.Copied: Game invitation link copied to clipboard
INVITATIONS.Instructions: Share the below invitation links with users who you wish to have join your game. The local invitation link is for users on your local network while the internet link connects via internet on the configured port.
INVITATIONS.Title: Game Invitation Links
INVITATIONS.OpenConnection: Your connection appears to be open
INVITATIONS.ClosedConnection: Your connection appears to be closed
INVITATIONS.UnknownConnection: We couldn't detect your connection status
JOURNAL.ActionShowSuccess: Showed the contents of {title} to {which} players.
JOURNAL.ShowBadPermissions: You may only show Journal Entries or Pages which you own.
JOURNAL.ShowNoPlayers: There are no other connected players to show this to.
JOURNAL.ShowOwnershipHint: Optionally update the ownership of this document for the players that it is being shown to. If a player already has a greater ownership level, they will not be downgraded.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.VideoSourceHint: This may be a local file, a remote video file URL, or a YouTube URL.
KEYBINDINGS.ResetWarning: Do you wish to reset all keybindings to their default values?
KEYBINDINGS.ResetSuccess: All keybindings have been reset to their default values.
KEYBINDINGS.HowToEdit: Use {icon} or double click key binding to change the value.
KEYBINDINGS.MustBeArray: Must pass in an Array of values
KEYBINDINGS.ErrorProtectedKey: Cannot set the Protected Key "{key}" as a binding
KEYBINDINGS.ErrorIllegalModifier: The requested modifier key "{key}" is not a valid value in KeyboardManager.MODIFIER_KEYS
KEYBINDINGS.ErrorReservedModifier: Cannot set "{key}" as a Binding, as it is a reserved modifier for this Keybinding Action
LIGHT.AngleHint: Limit the angle of emission for this light source, and configure its rotation.
LIGHT.ColorHint: Apply coloration to this light source and configure it's intensity.
LIGHT.ContrastHint: Adjust the contrast of surfaces that are illuminated by this light source. The default value for a standard light source is 0.
LIGHT.DarknessRangeHint: You may specify a range of darkness levels during which this light source will be visible.
LIGHT.AttenuationHint: Transition illumination gradually between bright, dim, and dark.
LIGHT.LuminosityHint: Adjust the brightness of this light source. More luminous lights are less diminished by darkness. The default value for a standard light source is 0.5.
LIGHT.RadiusHint: Configure the distance of light emission from this source where the radius of bright light is included within the radius of dim light.
LIGHT.SaturationHint: Adjust the saturation of surfaces that are illuminated by this light source. The default value for a standard light source is 0.
LIGHT.ShadowsHint: Enhance or the intensity of dark colors illuminated by this light source. The default value for a standard light source is 0.
LIGHT.VisionHint: Provide an additional source of vision for controlled Tokens.
LIGHT.WallsHint: Встановлює, чи буде область впливу для цього джерела світла обмежена прилеглими стінами.
LIGHT.ColorationTechniqueHint: The coloration technique applied to the light source contributes additive blending to the resulting appearance.
LIGHT.AnimationHint: Increases to animation speed make the animation play faster while increases to animation intensity make the animation more pronounced.
MACRO.DeleteWarning: This Macro will be permanently deleted for all Users.
MODMANAGE.Title: Module Management
MODMANAGE.Instructions: Use this form to configure which Modules are active within your current World. Submitting changes to active modules will cause the current session to reload.
MODMANAGE.View: The Modules listed below are currently active within this World.
MODMANAGE.None: No Modules are available within this World.
MODMANAGE.DepEnable: This module has {number} inactive dependencies which are required for it to function properly:
MODMANAGE.DepDisable: This module had {number} dependencies which may no longer be required:
MODMANAGE.DepDisableCheck: Would you like to disable them also?
MODMANAGE.DepMissing: You have enabled the module {module}, but it's dependencies {missing} are not enabled!
MODMANAGE.RequiredModule: This module is required to be active
MODMANAGE.DependencyIssues: Cannot be enabled due to issues in required dependencies
NOTE.GlobalHint: Allow this map note to be seen anywhere on the map by a player with permission to view it.
NUE.FirstLaunchBody: It looks like this is a new world. To get started, you should first add any additional players you might need via the User Management configuration. From there, you can create Actors for them, as well as any other important personas you need to represent. Maps and other visuals can be set up using Scenes, and handouts, notes, and other information can be stored in Journal Entries.
NUE.FirstLaunchHint: This chat card can be popped out by right-clicking it, or you can pop out the entire chat tab by right-clicking the speech bubble icon at the top. You can do the same thing to popout any of the other sidebar tabs as well.
NUE.FirstLaunchInviteBody: When everything is set up and you're ready to invite your players, you can send them a link to your world from the Invitation Links.
NUE.FirstLaunchKB: Be sure to investigate all of the tabs available in this sidebar, and for more in-depth information, you can review the Gamemaster Tutorial series in our Knowledge Base.
NUE.FirstLaunchTroubleshooting: If the Invitation Links dialog indicates that your connection is closed, you may need to set up port forwarding. You can find instructions on how to do this in our Port Forwarding Guide. If you still need help, you are welcome to join our Discord and make a post in #install-and-connection for invite issues, #troubleshooting for general issues with the software, or #core-how-to to find out how to do something in Foundry VTT.
PLAYERS.Title: Players
PLAYLIST.Name: Playlist Name
PLAYLIST.BulkImportWarning: No valid Playlist Sounds were imported from the requested "{path}" directory
SCENES.AudioPlaylistHint: A Playlist which should automatically begin playing when this Scene is activated.
SCENES.BackgroundImageHint: Configure the background image and dimensions of the scene's primary map.
SCENES.FogOverlayHint: An optional fog of war image which is drawn above unexplored parts of the scene.
SCENES.ForegroundImageHint: An optional foreground image which is drawn above other objects in the Scene.
SCENES.ForegroundElevationHint: An elevation in distance units which configures the height of the foreground image and overhead tiles.
SCENES.BackgroundScaleHint: Use SHIFT+Mousewheel or SHIFT+Up Arrow and SHIFT+Down Arrow to adjust the background image size.
SCENES.DarknessHint: Apply an overlay which darkens the Scene and diminishes light sources to simulate nighttime or dimly illuminated conditions.
SCENES.DimensionsHint: Фонові розміри визначають розмір полотна сцени. Ці значення встановлюються автоматично.
SCENES.DimensionChangeWarning: You are changing the underlying dimensions of this Scene, if you have already placed objects in this Scene this operation may cause those objects to shift position relative to the background image.
SCENES.FogExploreHint: Track the exploration progress of Tokens, removing fog of war for areas which have been explored. If disabled, only a Token's current position is visible.
SCENES.GenerateThumbNoCanvas: Не вдалося створити мініатюру сцени оскільки налаштування 'Вимкнути Ігрове Полотно' активне.
SCENES.GlobalIllumHint: This Scene contains a global source of light which provides all areas of the Scene with a base level of illumination.
SCENES.GlobalLightThresholdHint: A darkness threshold between 0 and 1. When the Scene darkness level exceeds this threshold Global Illumination is automatically disabled.
SCENES.GridConfigToolHint: Configure the grid and background image position using the mousewheel and arrow keys, or by manually setting the following fields.
SCENES.GridSizeHint: The pixel size of a single grid space. Use the Grid Configuration tool to visually adjust this.
SCENES.GridResizeHint: Use ALT+Mousewheel or ALT+Up Arrow and ALT+Down Arrow to adjust the grid size.
SCENES.GridPositionHint: Use the Arrow Keys to shift the background image offset.
SCENES.InitialViewHint: Set a default camera position that is displayed the first time this Scene is viewed.
SCENES.NavNameHint: An alternative name for the Scene that is displayed in the Navigation Bar instead of the actual Scene name.
SCENES.PaddingHint: Кількість додаткового поля навколо фонового зображення сцени, що забезпечує простір для застосування полотна.
SCENES.JournalEntryHint: A linked Journal Entry which provides notes for the Game Master about this Scene.
SCENES.PlaylistSoundHint: A specific Sound within the Audio Playlist which should play when this Scene is active.
SCENES.TokenVisionHint: Restrict visibility within this Scene to the vision of controlled Tokens. If disabled, the entire Scene is visible.
SCENES.WeatherEffectHint: Display an active Weather Effect which is present within this Scene.
SCENES.FogExploredColorHint: A color applied to all areas of the Scene which have been explored but are outside of the current vision area.
SCENES.FogUnexploredColorHint: A solid color applied to all unexplored areas of the Scene.
SETTINGS.CombatThemeL: The set of Sounds that will play when Combat begins, when your turn is next, and when it is your turn
SETTINGS.Title: Configure Game Settings
SETTINGS.ResetInfo: Reset all settings back to default values. Click "Save Changes" to confirm.
SETTINGS.AnimVisionL: Animate Token vision and light changes during Token movement animations. Disabling this will improve performance for lower-end machines.
SETTINGS.AnimLightL: Allow light source animations. Disabling this will improve performance for lower-end machines.
SETTINGS.FPSMeterL: Показувати частоту кадрів у правому нижньому куті екрану, який повідомляє про швидкодію рендерингу кадрів в кадрах за секунду.
SETTINGS.ResolutionScaleL: Масштабування роздільної здатності ігрового полотна відповідно до виявленого співвідношення пікселів браузера. Для пристроїв з високою щільністю пікселів (як-от Retina Display) це збільшить роздільну здатність зображення полотна за рахунок продуктивності програми. Масштабування роздільності також впливає на масштаб налаштувань браузера або відображення операційної системи. В таких випадках цей параметр збільшить або зменшить ефективну роздільну здатність полотна в залежності від обсягу збільшення, яке буде застосовано. Вимкнення цього параметру може підвищити продуктивність за рахунок візуальної якості для дисплеїв високої щільності пікселів.
SETTINGS.LangL: Change the displayed language for Foundry Virtual Tabletop.
SETTINGS.LClickReleaseL: Якщо увімкнено, клацнути лівою кнопкою по порожньому полотні, щоб випустити будь-які неконтрольовані об'єкти. Якщо вимкнено, об’єкти будуть випущені, вибравши пустий простір, натисніть на об'єкт, або натисніть escape.
SETTINGS.NoCanvasL: Ігрове полотно, яке забезпечує візуальне представлення віртуальної таблиці, може бути вимкнене. Це дозволяє низькоякісним машинам використовувати піднабір програмних функцій.
SETTINGS.CBubL: Configure whether or not chat bubbles will be displayed above Tokens for in-character and emote type chat messages.
SETTINGS.CBubPL: Configure whether to automatically pan the camera to a speaking token when it displays a chat bubble.
SETTINGS.MaxFPSL: Обмежити максимальну частоту кадрів у Foundry Virtual Tabletop. Зниження цього значення може покращити продуктивність програми для менш потужного обладнання.
SETTINGS.FontConfigH: Configure additional fonts that will be available for use in this world.
SETTINGS.FontSizeL: Enlarge or reduce the font size used in the application.
SETTINGS.MipMapL: Compute mipmaps to antialias sprite textures at lower levels of zoom. This is a client setting as different users may prefer different visual styles.
SETTINGS.PerformanceModeL: Виберіть режим продуктивності, що впливає на якість рендерингу та продуктивність програми. Менша продуктивність буде працювати краще для менш потужного обладнання.
SETTINGS.ScrollStatusL: Тест буде з'являтися над токенами або іншими об'єктами полотна, щоб надати текстовий відгук про зміни цього об’єкта.
SETTINGS.SoftSL: Enable soft shadows for more beautiful dynamic lighting, or disable it for improved performance on machines with lower-end hardware.
SETTINGS.TokenDragPreviewL: When enabled, vision and lighting for a Token is previewed in real time during a left-click drag workflow. This is disabled by default because it may promote undesirable meta-gaming behaviors.
SETTINGS.DefaultTokenH: Configure default Token values for newly created Actors.
SETTINGS.PermissionReset: Reset User role permission configuration to default values.
SETTINGS.EditorAutosaveH: The number of seconds between each autosave for any open ProseMirror editor.
SETTINGS.ReloadPromptBody: Some of the changed settings require a reload of the application to take effect. Would you like to reload now?
SETUP.CoreVersionHint: If an update to the core Foundry Virtual Tabletop software is available, you may apply it here. You are currently using {versionDisplay}.
SETUP.YouMustInstallASystem: You must install a game System before you can create a new World
SETUP.UpdateAvailable: An update to {channel} version {version} is now available!
SETUP.ConfigurationWarning: These fields customize the behavior of the Foundry Virtual Tabletop application. Changes will require the server to restart.
SETUP.MinifyFilesHint: Reduce network traffic by serving minified static JavaScript and CSS files. Enabling this setting is recommended for most users, but module developers may wish to disable it.
SETUP.NoSystemsMessage: In order to create your first World, you must first install a Game System. Please take some time to browse available systems and choose one to install. If you do not know which system you want, or your preferred system is unavailable, we recommend that you install the Simple Worldbuilding system.
SETUP.NoWorldsMessage: Now that you have a Game System providing you rules on how to play, you'll want to create a World. Game worlds are spaces that contain all of the characters, sheets, journals and maps used to play a game, whether it's a one-shot or a full campaign.
SETUP.NueWorldDescription: For more info on setting up Worlds, check out the World documentation.
SETUP.SeeTutorial: For a more in-depth guide to getting started with Foundry Virtual Tabletop, you can reference the Gamemaster Tutorial series in our Knowledge Base.
SETUP.Title: Configuration and Setup
SETUP.CoreUpdateInstructions: An update to the Core Software is available, Return to Setup in order to apply it!
SETUP.SystemUpdateInstructions: An update to the System is available, Return to Setup in order to apply it!
SETUP.PackagesNoResults: No packages matched your filter. You can search the Package list for {name}
SETUP.UpdateChannelHint: You may choose an update channel to control the types of updates you wish to receive for the core Foundry Virtual Tabletop software. If you do not have a specific reason to change this, it is recommended to consume the Stable channel.
SETUP.UpdateHint: You may update your Foundry Virtual Tabletop software to a new version by checking for update on your preferred Software Update Channel.
SETUP.UpdatePrototypeHint: Prototype: Releases for previewing the design of experimental features which are not yet fully developed.
SETUP.UpdateDevelopmentHint: API Development: Releases for testing the design of new features and API changes to obtain feedback from the developer community.
SETUP.UpdateTestingHint: Feature Testing: Releases for testing the functionality of new features to obtain feedback from the general user community.
SETUP.UpdateStableHint: Stable: Releases that have been carefully tested and are recommended for use in live games.
SETUP.ForceUpdateHint: Selecting the Force Update option will overwrite your current software by resetting it back to the latest version on your requested update channel. Use this option with caution.
SETUP.LockHint: Locking a Package prevents it from being uninstalled or updated
SETUP.FullListOfReleaseNotes: For a full list of Release Notes, please see {url}
SETUP.ManifestUpdate: Updated version available at new installation URL
SETUP.ManifestUpdateAvailable: A newer version of "{package}" is available at a different installation URL. This happens when the package hosting location or the author has changed.
SETUP.SwapToTheUpdatedManifest: Would you like to switch to the new manifest URL? (this is recommended)
SETUP.ConfigSaveWarning: Modifying these configuration options will cause the server to be shut down and require that you restart the server manually. Do you wish to continue?
SETUP.ConfigSaveRestart: The Foundry Virtual Tabletop server has been shut down with configuration changes applied. You must manually restart your server.
SETUP.CompatibilityRiskUnknown: Compatibility Risk: no compatibility data specified
SETUP.CompatibilityRequireUpgrade: This dependency is older than the minimum required version {version}
SETUP.CompatibilityRequireDowngrade: This dependency is newer than the minimum required version {version}
SETUP.InstallHint: You can install any package by providing a direct link to its JSON manifest URL.
SETUP.InstallFailure: Installation Failed: {message}. See the Console (F12) for more details.
SETUP.PackageFilterHint: You can filter available packages by name.
SETUP.PackageHasDependencies: {title} has {number} dependencies which are not yet installed. You may not be able to use this package if these dependencies are not present.
SETUP.PackageInstallDependencies: Do you wish to install these automatically?
SETUP.PackageDependenciesCouldNotInstall: {number} dependencies need to be manually installed.
SETUP.PackageDependenciesDecline: You have chosen not to install the required dependency packages for {title}. You will need to install them manually.
SETUP.PackageUpdateCoreUpdateNeeded: An update is available for {id} but cannot be installed because it requires the core software to be updated to as least {vmin}. You are currently using version {vcur}.
SETUP.PackageUpdateCoreUnstable: An update is available for {id} but it may not be installed because it requires a core software version {vmin} which is not yet stable.
SETUP.PackageDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the {type} {title}?
SETUP.WorldDeleteConfirm1: Warning: This will permanently delete your world content and can not be un-done. Are you sure you wish to do this?.
SETUP.WorldDeleteConfirm2: Type this exact code in the box below to proceed:
SETUP.PackageDeleteWorldConfirm: You must enter the exact code to confirm the deletion request.
SETUP.UpdateCompleteManual: Update completed successfully. Shutting down Foundry Virtual Tabletop server for manual restart.
SETUP.UpdateCompleteAuto: Update completed successfully. Restarting Foundry VTT application.
SETUP.UpdateNoInternetError: Foundry Virtual Tabletop requires an active internet connection to update.
SETUP.UpdateWebsiteUnreachableError: We cannot reach https://foundryvtt.com at this time, please try again later.
SETUP.UpdateWebsiteSlowWarning: https://foundryvtt.com appears to be under heavy load at this time, we recommend you try again later.
SETUP.UpdateWarningWillDisable: This update is a new major version of the Foundry Virtual Tabletop software. Installing this update will require some installed modules which may not yet be compatible to be disabled.
SETUP.UpdateInfoAvailable: An update to Foundry Virtual Tabletop version {display} is available!
SETUP.UpdateNoUpdateMode: You are not allowed to update this instance of Foundry Virtual Tabletop because it was launched in --noupdate mode.
SETUP.UpdateNotAvailable: No software update is currently available on the requested update channel.
SETUP.UpdateNoArchive: No update archive exists to install
SETUP.UpdateLicenseInvalid: Your Foundry Virtual Tabletop license key is not valid.
SETUP.WorldMigrationRequired: Launching the world {world} will migrate its data model from an older core software version ({oldVersion}) to the currently installed {newVersion}.
SETUP.WorldMigrationSystemUnavailable: The installed version of the {system} ({systemVersion}) game system is not verified as compatible with this software version. Successful migration cannot be guaranteed.
SETUP.WorldMigrationDisableModules: Please update installed game systems and modules before migrating your world. Currently, {nIncompatible} out of {nModules} installed modules are not verified as compatible and will be automatically disabled. You may re-enable them manually after the migration.
SETUP.WorldMigrationBackupPrompt: It is not possible to reverse this process. It is recommended to back up your world data before proceeding. You will need a backup in order to restore to the prior software version.
SETUP.WorldMigrationInProcess: Your world data is being migrated to be compatible with {version}. This may take some time. Please remain patient and do not close the software.
SETUP.AdminPasswordHint: You may assign a special administrator password which is required in order to access this setup screen.
SETUP.AdminPasswordPrompt: You must provide the administrator password in order to access application setup.
SETUP.AdminPasswordForgot: If you have forgotten your password, you can reset it by following these instructions.
SETUP.AWSHint: You may provide an AWS configuration file for S3 integration. The path is absolute or relative to the Config subdirectory of user data.
SETUP.CompressStaticHint: Compress files served by the Foundry Virtual Tabletop web server before sending them to the client to reduce the amount of data transferred.
SETUP.DefaultLanguageHint: You may choose a default language for the application by choosing a module which provides the core translation files for that language.
SETUP.PortHint: You may choose which port Foundry Virtual Tabletop uses for TCP connection traffic and enable or disable Universal Plug and Play (UPnP).
SETUP.DataPathHint: Configure the location where your user data including worlds, systems and modules are stored.
SETUP.WorldHint: You may choose one of your available worlds to automatically launch when the software is started.
SETUP.SSLCertHint: You may run the server using secure socket layer (SSL) encryption by providing paths to certificate and key files. Paths are absolute or relative to the Config subdirectory in user data.
PACKAGE.SetupErrors: {number} critical errors encountered with installed Packages. Consult your console log (F12) for details.
PACKAGE.SetupWarnings: {number} compatibility warnings detected with installed Packages. Consult your console log (F12) for details.
PACKAGE.InstallFailed: Errors were encountered while installing the package. Consult your console log (F12) for details.
JOIN.AuthAdmin: You are authenticated as a server administrator user.
JOIN.ErrorUserDoesNotExist: The requested User, "{user}", does not exist!
JOIN.ErrorBanned: {user} does not have permission to access this World!
SHEETS.DocumentSheetHint: Override which sheet type you would like to use for this specific document.
SHEETS.TypeSheetHint: Set the default sheet type used for this document type (GM Only).
SHEETS.DocumentSheetPrivate: You do not have sufficient permission to view the sheet for this {type}.
SOUND.ConfigHint: Configure the ambient sound to play an audio file when tokens move within it's radius.
SOUND.EasingHint: Adjust the volume level of the sound as Tokens move closer to the origin.
SOUND.MaxVolHint: Define the maximum volume of the sound at it's origin point (if easing) or everywhere in the area.
SOUND.DarknessRangeHint: You may specify a range of darkness levels during which this ambient sound will be audible.
SOUND.WallsHint: Встановлює, чи буде область впливу для цього джерела звуку обмежена прилеглими стінами.
FOLDER.DeleteWarning: This folder and its contents will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
FOLDER.Name: Folder Name
FOLDER.RemoveWarning: This folder will be permanently deleted and its contents will be moved to its parent folder.
FOLDER.ExportHint: You may export contained Documents from this folder into an unlocked Compendium pack of the appropriate type.
FOLDER.ExportWarningNone: There are no unlocked compendium packs available for {type} Documents which you can export to.
FOLDER.CreateTableConfirm: Create a new Rollable Table document using the contents of this Folder as table results?
FOLDER.DocumentSortHint: Configure the sorted order of this Document relative to others in its collection. Lower numbers are sorted first.
OWNERSHIP.Title: Ownership Configuration
OWNERSHIP.HintFolder: Configure access for all Documents within this Folder. Changes will be applied to all contained Documents, excluding the contents of sub-folders.
OWNERSHIP.HintDocument: Configure access to this specific Document, allowing each User to be assigned a different level of visibility.
PERMISSION.Title: User Permission Configuration
PERMISSION.ConfigureHint: Fine tune the permitted actions which are allowed to Users for each role.
PERMISSION.Instructions: Configure which User role has permission to perform which action. Note that some actions cannot be disabled for Game Master users. Some changes may not take effect until the game is reloaded.
PERMISSION.BroadcastAudioHint: Allow users with this role to broadcast audio when using A/V chat integration.
PERMISSION.BroadcastVideoHint: Allow users with this role to broadcast video when using A/V chat integration.
PERMISSION.ActorCreateHint: Allow users with this role to create new Actors in the World.
PERMISSION.DrawingCreateHint: Allow users with this role to create Drawings using the drawing tools.
PERMISSION.ItemCreateHint: Allow users with this role to create new Items in the World.
PERMISSION.FilesBrowseHint: Allow users with this role to browse through available files in the File Browser.
PERMISSION.FilesUploadHint: Allow users with this role to upload content to the server using the File Browser.
PERMISSION.JournalCreateHint: Allow users with this role to create new Journal Entries in the Journal sidebar.
PERMISSION.MacroScriptHint: Allow users with this role to use JavaScript macros which access the API.
PERMISSION.MessageWhisperHint: Allow users with this role whisper private messages that the Game Master cannot see.
PERMISSION.NoteCreateHint: Allow users with this role to create Note objects from Journal Entries which they own.
PERMISSION.PingCanvasHint: Дозволити користувачам з цією роллю привертати увагу до точки на полотні з анімацією пінгу.
PERMISSION.SettingsModifyHint: Allow users with this role to modify game settings and enable or disable modules.
PERMISSION.ShowCursorHint: Відображення положення курсору мишки гравця, який ілюструє місцезнаходження користувача на полотні.
PERMISSION.ShowRulerHint: Display measurement using the ruler tool to other connected players.
PERMISSION.TemplateCreateHint: Allow users with this role to create templates for area-of-effect measurement.
PERMISSION.TokenCreateHint: Дозволити користувачам із цією роллю розміщувати токени акторів, якими вони володіють на полотні гри.
PERMISSION.TokenDeleteHint: Дозволити користувачам із цією роллю видаляти токени акторів, якими вони володіють на полотні гри.
PERMISSION.TokenConfigureHint: Allow users with this role to configure the settings for Tokens that they own.
PERMISSION.WallDoorsHint: Дозволити користувачам з цією роллю взаємодіяти з дверима, визначеними на Шарі Стін.
PERMISSION.WarningNoCreate: You do not have sufficient permission to create a {document}.
SIDEBAR.DeleteWarning: This {type} will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
SUPPORT.Title: Support Details
SUPPORT.Discord: To join others who are using Foundry VTT, or to get support from our wonderful Community Helpers, join our Discord here:
SUPPORT.BugReporting: If you would like to report a bug, please use the Bug Report category available on our Contact Us page:
SUPPORT.ReportPrelude: When asking for help on the Discord or Github, it is helpful for us to know about what is going on in your World. Below is a copy-pastable report we ask that you include.
TABLE.AnimateSettingHint: Display a roulette-style animation when drawing from a Roll Table.
TABLE.DrawFlavor: Draws a result from the {name} table
TEMPLATE.ConeTypeSettingHint: Choose how the area of effect for cone templates should be defined.
TILE.BasicHint: Configure this tile sprite which is displayed above the Scene background.
TILE.OverheadHint: Additional attributes which apply if the Tile is overhead in the Foreground.
TILE.AnimationHint: Additional attributes which apply if the Tile uses an animated video texture.
TOKEN.AssignWarn: You must select one existing Token to assign as the new prototype configuration.
TOKEN.Title: Token Configuration
TOKEN.VisionEnabledHint: Allows the token to see illuminated spaces within its line of sight.
TOKEN.VisionRangeHint: The distance a token can see without any light.
TOKEN.VisionAngleHint: The angle of the vision cone (default is 360).
TOKEN.VisionAttenuationHint: Adjust the strength of the vision source attenuation (default is 0).
TOKEN.VisionContrastHint: Adjust the contrast of the background which is in the vision source radius (default is 0).
TOKEN.VisionSaturationHint: Adjust the saturation of the background which is in the vision source radius (default is 0).
TOKEN.VisionBrightnessHint: Adjust the brightness of this vision source. The greater the brightness, the better the character is able to see in darkness (default is 0).
TOKEN.WarningNoActor: This Token references an Actor which no longer exists within the World.
TOKEN.WarningNoVision: You do not own any Token with vision in this Scene
TOKEN.VisionModeHint: Applies a visual effect to the vision to represent special senses (default is Basic Vision).
TOURS.ResetWarning: Do you wish to reset all tour progress?
TOURS.ResetSuccess: Reset the completion status of all tours.
TOURS.SuggestedDescription:
You have completed the {currentTitle} Tour.

We suggest continuing on to the {nextTitle} Tour. Would you like to proceed?
USERS.UpdateSuccess: Game users updated successfully, returning to the game World.
USERS.NoGMError: You must have at least one Game Master user within your World.
USERS.DeleteWarning: This user will be permanently deleted from the game world.
USERS.DeleteGMWarning: You are about to delete a Game Master user!
WALLS.Title: Налаштування Стіни
WALLS.Instructions: Налаштовуйте як цей сегмент стіни обмежує рух або почуття.
WEBRTC.Title: Audio/Video Configuration
WEBRTC.MenuHint: Configure settings specific to the integrated Audio/Video WebRTC component
WEBRTC.VideoDeviceNotes: Select which video capture device you wish to use, if any.
WEBRTC.AudioDeviceNotes: Select which audio capture device you wish to use, if any.
WEBRTC.AudioOutputNotes: Select which audio output device you wish to use.
WEBRTC.DeviceUnavailableWarning: Audio/Video communication was unable to start because one of the configured input devices was unavailable.
WEBRTC.GeneralTabNotGM: General Audio/Video Conferencing Settings can only be modified by the GM
WEBRTC.AVModeNotes: Only a Game Master user may change this setting, which will require Foundry VTT to reload.
WEBRTC.PTTKeyWarn: Your Push-to-Talk key is using an old value and may not work as expected, please reconfigure it.
WEBRTC.VoiceModeNotes: Choose how your voice is broadcast in AV calls.
WEBRTC.CaptureWarningVideo: Unable to capture from your Audio devices; Sharing Video only
WEBRTC.CaptureWarningAudio: Unable to capture from your Video devices; Sharing Audio only
WEBRTC.CaptureErrorAudioVideo: Unable to capture from your Audio & Video devices
WEBRTC.CaptureErrorVideo: Unable to capture from your Video devices
WEBRTC.CaptureErrorAudio: Unable to capture from your Audio devices
WEBRTC.ConnectError: Error connection to Audio/Video Signalling Server
WEBRTC.ConnectionLostWarning: Lost connection to the Audio/Video Signalling server. Trying to re-establish connection.
WEBRTC.NoSSLError: You cannot use Audio/Video calls unless your Foundry VTT server is using SSL certificates. See the online documentation for instructions.
WEBRTC.WarningCannotEnableVideo: You cannot enable your camera because you do not have permission to broadcast your video feed.
WEBRTC.WarningCannotEnableAudio: You cannot enable your microphone because you do not have permission to broadcast your audio feed.
WORLD.Title: World Title
WORLD.SafeModeHint: Disables all modules and active scenes, and stops any playing audio
